(ROOT
  (S
    (SBAR (RB Just)
      (S
        (NP (DT a) (JJ quick) (NN post))
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB let)
            (NP (PRP you))))))
    (NP (DT all))
    (VP (VBP know)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ favorite) (NNP Bak) (NNP Chor) (NNP Mee) (NN place))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT which))
              (S
                (VP (VBD used)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB open)
                        (PP (IN till)
                          (NP (CD 4pm))))))))))
          (VP (VBZ has)
            (ADVP (RB now))
            (VP (VBN extended)
              (NP (PRP$ their) (NN opening) (NN time))
              (PP (IN till)
                (NP (CD 10pm))))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(let-6, Just-1)
det(post-4, a-2)
amod(post-4, quick-3)
nsubj(let-6, post-4)
aux(let-6, to-5)
advcl(know-9, let-6)
dobj(let-6, you-7)
nsubj(know-9, all-8)
root(ROOT-0, know-9)
mark(extended-25, that-10)
poss(place-16, my-11)
amod(place-16, favorite-12)
nn(place-16, Bak-13)
nn(place-16, Chor-14)
nn(place-16, Mee-15)
nsubj(extended-25, place-16)
nsubj(used-18, which-17)
rcmod(place-16, used-18)
aux(open-20, to-19)
xcomp(used-18, open-20)
prep(open-20, till-21)
pobj(till-21, 4pm-22)
aux(extended-25, has-23)
advmod(extended-25, now-24)
ccomp(know-9, extended-25)
poss(time-28, their-26)
nn(time-28, opening-27)
dobj(extended-25, time-28)
prep(extended-25, till-29)
pobj(till-29, 10pm-30)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (JJ famous) (`` ``) (NN clop) (NN clop) ('' '') (NN man))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP who))
        (S
          (VP
            (VP (VBZ throws)
              (NP (DT the) (NN bowls)))
            (CC and)
            (VP (VBZ makes)
              (NP (DT a) (NN lot)))))))
    (PP (IN of)
      (NP
        (NP (NN noise))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB when))
          (S
            (NP (PRP he))
            (VP (VBD cooks)
              (SBAR
                (S
                  (NP (DT the) (NNS noodles))
                  (VP (VBZ is)
                    (ADVP (RB now))
                    (VP (VBG doing)
                      (NP (DT the) (NN evening) (NN shift))))
                  (, ,))))))))))


det(man-7, The-1)
amod(man-7, famous-2)
nn(man-7, clop-4)
nn(man-7, clop-5)
root(ROOT-0, man-7)
nsubj(throws-9, who-8)
rcmod(man-7, throws-9)
det(bowls-11, the-10)
dobj(throws-9, bowls-11)
cc(throws-9, and-12)
conj(throws-9, makes-13)
det(lot-15, a-14)
dobj(makes-13, lot-15)
prep(man-7, of-16)
pobj(of-16, noise-17)
advmod(cooks-20, when-18)
nsubj(cooks-20, he-19)
rcmod(noise-17, cooks-20)
det(noodles-22, the-21)
nsubj(doing-25, noodles-22)
aux(doing-25, is-23)
advmod(doing-25, now-24)
ccomp(cooks-20, doing-25)
det(shift-28, the-26)
nn(shift-28, evening-27)
dobj(doing-25, shift-28)


(ROOT
  (S (IN so)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB catch)
        (NP (PRP him))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (NN action)))
        (PP (IN at)
          (NP (NN night)))))
    (. .)))


dep(catch-4, so-1)
nsubj(catch-4, you-2)
aux(catch-4, can-3)
root(ROOT-0, catch-4)
dobj(catch-4, him-5)
prep(catch-4, in-6)
pobj(in-6, action-7)
prep(catch-4, at-8)
pobj(at-8, night-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (ADVP (RB there))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (NP
        (NP (NNS lots))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNP Bak) (NNP Chor) (NNP Mee))))
      (ADVP (RB around)))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB always))
    (VP (VBP end)
      (PRT (RP up))
      (S
        (VP (VBG coming)
          (ADVP (RB here))
          (SBAR (IN because)
            (S
              (NP (PRP I))
              (VP (VBP get)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB order)
                      (NP (DT the) (NNP Fish) (NNP Maw) (NNP Soup)))))))))))
    (, ,)))


cc(end-4, but-1)
nsubj(end-4, I-2)
advmod(end-4, always-3)
root(ROOT-0, end-4)
prt(end-4, up-5)
xcomp(end-4, coming-6)
advmod(coming-6, here-7)
mark(get-10, because-8)
nsubj(get-10, I-9)
advcl(coming-6, get-10)
aux(order-12, to-11)
xcomp(get-10, order-12)
det(Soup-16, the-13)
nn(Soup-16, Fish-14)
nn(Soup-16, Maw-15)
dobj(order-12, Soup-16)

  (S

    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT the) (NN tastiest)))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (JJS most) (NN value))
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP (NN money))))
    (VP (VBP bowl)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (S
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NN fish) (NN maw) (NN soup)))
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (MD can)
              (VP (VB get)
                (ADVP (RB anywhere)))))
          (CC and)
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBP am)
              (ADVP (RB also))
              (ADJP (RB quite) (VBN addicted)
                (PP (TO to)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNP Nam) (NNP Joo) (JJ fried) (NN pork)))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WDT which))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBZ goes)
                      (ADVP (RB really))
                      (ADVP (RB well))
                      (PP (IN with)
                        (NP (DT the) (NNP Mee) (NNP Pok))))))))))))
    (. .)))


amod(value-2, most-1)
nsubj(bowl-5, value-2)
prep(value-2, for-3)
pobj(for-3, money-4)
root(ROOT-0, bowl-5)
prep(get-12, of-6)
nn(soup-9, fish-7)
nn(soup-9, maw-8)
pobj(of-6, soup-9)
nsubj(get-12, you-10)
aux(get-12, can-11)
dep(bowl-5, get-12)
advmod(get-12, anywhere-13)
cc(get-12, and-14)
nsubjpass(addicted-19, I-15)
auxpass(addicted-19, am-16)
advmod(addicted-19, also-17)
advmod(addicted-19, quite-18)
conj(get-12, addicted-19)
prep(addicted-19, to-20)
det(pork-25, the-21)
nn(pork-25, Nam-22)
nn(pork-25, Joo-23)
amod(pork-25, fried-24)
pobj(to-20, pork-25)
nsubj(goes-27, which-26)
ccomp(addicted-19, goes-27)
advmod(goes-27, really-28)
advmod(goes-27, well-29)
prep(goes-27, with-30)
det(Pok-33, the-31)
nn(Pok-33, Mee-32)
pobj(with-30, Pok-33)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB read)
        (NP (JJR more))
        (PP (IN about)
          (NP
            (NP (PRP it))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ previous) (NN post)))))
        (ADVP (RB here))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(read-3, You-1)
aux(read-3, can-2)
root(ROOT-0, read-3)
dobj(read-3, more-4)
prep(read-3, about-5)
pobj(about-5, it-6)
prep(it-6, in-7)
poss(post-10, my-8)
amod(post-10, previous-9)
pobj(in-7, post-10)
advmod(read-3, here-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This) (NN stall))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (ADVP (RB now))
      (VP (VBN relocated)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (NNP Serangoon) (NNP Gardens) (NNP Food) (NNP Centre) (NNP Stall) (NN No.)))))))

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (CD 4))
    (. .)))
